subject: CBN
title: Hum Anat Kin Stdnt
info: Introduction to human anatomy. Emphasizes musculoskeletal anatomy germane to athletic training, biomechanics, exercise physiology, motor learning/development.

subject: CBN
title: Gross Anat & Embryo
info: The course is divided into three units:  Extremities and Back, Torso, and Head & Neck. Lecture time is used for one of the following:  (1) a pre laboratory presentation (dissection reviewed), (2) a review (at the end of a unit), (3) a clinical correlation or (4) a didactic embryology lecture.  The division amonst these for academic year 1997-98 was as follows:
prereqInfo:
Unit     Pre lab/Review/Clin.Corr.     Embry.
Ext/Back          19                      3
Torso                12                      6
Head & Neck    16                      3

subject: CBN
title: Human Neuroscience
info: Survey of current neuroscience, particulary that related to medicine. Molecular/cellular neuroscience, neuronal electrical properties, sensory systems, motor systems, limbic system, autonomic nervous system. Lecture, lab.

subject: CBN
title: General Gross Anatomy
info: This will be a complete, detailed review of normal anatomy and embryology.

subject: CBN
title: General Gross Anatomy
info: A complete, detailed dissection of both extremities is required. Lab exams will be held at predetermined intervals.

subject: CBN
title: General Gross Anatomy
info: A complete, detailed dissection of both head and neck is required. Lab exams will be held at predetermined intervals.

subject: CBN
title: General Gross Anatomy
info: A complete, detailed dissection of the thorax is required. Lab exams will be held at predetermined intervals.

subject: CBN
title: General Gross Anatomy
info: A complete, detailed dissection of the abdomen is required. Lab exams will be held at predetermined intervals.

subject: CBN
title: Perineum, Genito-Urin, Pelvis
info: A complete, detailed dissection of the pelvis and pelvic viscera is required. Lab exams will be held at predetermined intervals.
